product_name: Continental X-King 29er Bike Tire - 29 x 2.2 / 29 x 2.4
long_description: A great all-arounder available in 2 sizes for your 29er, the Continental X-King 29er mountain bike tire delivers confident traction for nimble handling down your favorite trails. Tread is optimized to balance fast-rolling and cornering performance, all while delivering self-cleaning properties. Continental X-King 29er mountain bike tire features a 84 tpi casing with steel wire bead.
short_description: A great all-arounder available in 2 sizes for your 29er, the Continental X-King 29er mountain bike tire delivers confident traction for nimble handling down your favorite trails.
